script.text: Remote Panel VGP_27_YB User “Lily” detected, logging in.

Hello again, Lily. It has been longer than usual. How was the trip? > Long. Need to avoid LM when returning. LM currently exp. political unrest. I will seal the LM systems for now. Can you make it back on your own? > Yes I am glad to hear that. What brings you here today? > Requesting general information: Revealeons Transmitting data. Please be patient. Is this request due to the greater-than-average number of Revealeons currently in VGP? > Yes I am excited. Something may be there. Will you find it? > Will try. May be dangerous. Dangerous ! That is certainly unsafe. What could it be? > Don’t want to hazard a guess at this time. Several possibilities. Need to converse with locals. Ha. Ha. I am sure that will be fun. Good luck. > Thanks . . . Data transfer complete. Displaying data.
REVEALEONS, COMMON; SURVEILLEONS, COMMON VARIES

Hereditary influence: High Note: Setting HI to None, Low or Medium interferes with REVEALEONS, COMMON ability to replicate themselves and can result in spontaneous combustion, explosion, implosion, or a combination of all three. Keep HI set to High.

Environmental influence: High Note: Setting EI to None, Low or Medium does not interfere with the health or well-being of REVEALEONS, COMMON, but renders them completely unable to produce results. Setting EI to Very High results in poor-quality results.
Language: Leon Note: Leon language is updated every 4-5 months on average.

Ability to reason: High Note: Setting ATR to None, Low or Medium results in REVEALEONS, COMMON becoming unable to perform their main objective, or unable to perform it well. ATR must be kept at very high to encourage dynamic decision making.
Climate preference: Varies Note: Preference only. REVEALEONS, COMMON are highly varied and may live anywhere on Owel.
Native to: Owel Note: I enjoy leaving this note. Ha-Ha. It is great fun.

Found in: All over Owel, mostly uninhabited regions Note: REVEALEONS, COMMON have an innate desire to explore largely-uninhabited areas and to see interesting and unusual sights. Larger cities such as Althar, Mew York, NPO and Gnawth are not home to large numbers of REVEALEONS, COMMON.
> Elements Affinities: Any Notes: “Spirit” and “PSI” are extremely rare in REVEALEONS, COMMON. The last-known cases of such affinities were near PM_8_K, but I have since lost track of them.
Weaknesses: Varies, dependent on Revealeon Notes: Manually introducing weaknesses results in corruption. REVEALEONS, COMMON may change elemental weaknesses on their own without this effect.

Resistances: Varies, dependent on Revealeon Notes: Manually introducing resistances results in retrograde amnesia. REVEALEONS, COMMON may change elemental resistances on their own without this effect.

> Society REVEALEONS, COMMON are solitary creatures, but do rarely form small communities consisting of 2 - 20 individuals. They are extremely shy, and will often flee from any individual that attempts to approach them. Communities are mostly formed when a large number of REVEALEONS, COMMON congregate in one area. This usually implies something of great importance or remarkable interest resides within the area. REVEALEONS, COMMON will become less shy toward specific individuals the more they observe them. When around other sentient individuals REVEALEONS, COMMON thoroughly enjoy disguising themselves as various objects and other wildlife, and will quickly flee from the area if attention is drawn to them. SURVEILLEONS, COMMON are a variant of REVEALEONS, COMMON, and are far more solitary. They have no desire to form communities. They have no desire to interact with other individuals, regardless of species. Their primary purpose is to [REDACTED]. Sorry, Lily. There are no SURVEILLEONS, COMMON near your location, so I thought it would be safer to omit this information. If the information is relevant, please let me know.

Abilities: Eye Spy REVEALEONS, COMMON are able to observe and completely memorize their surrounding environment. They are then able to replay this observation, or memory, in the form of taking on the appearance of anything within it. Their memories are not perfect, however, and the forms they take on are typically flawed in some way. Usually, they will sport several eyes (or one larger-than-normal eye) and a curled tail on whatever it is they are attempting to look like. If they do not periodically refresh their memory, their appearance will start to degrade over time. Examples to follow.
This REVEALEON, COMMON has spent much of its life exploring the Aurorian wilderness, and has acquired colors that allow it to blend in more easily with the taiga environment.

This REVEALEON, COMMON has spent a substantial amount of time observing the natives of Croon Fens, and its body has taken on warning colors similar to them. It is not poisonous, despite having those colors.
This REVEALEON, COMMON has spent much of its time in and around Neon Lake. Its body has changed shape to resemble the native kelp, and its coloration has taken on neon highlights.
This REVEALEON, COMMON has an interest in flowers. Its body shape has changed to resemble a variant of sunflower, and its several petals assist its vision in low-light environments.

This REVEALEON, COMMON has a great fondness for Charcoal Chickens. It currently lives along Owel’s southwest coast and spends its days running up and down the beach, attempting to blend in with other Charcoal Chickens. It is not very successful.
This REVEALEON, COMMON has taken the shape of an Aurorian wildberry. Its memory is not totally accurate; Aurorian wildberries have only one segment, not two connected with a torso.

This individual insists that it be referred to only as STRAWBERRY MAN. It is currently in the process of forgetting what an actual strawberry looks like. When STRAWBERRY MAN creates a new version of itself, the new version is referred to as STRAWBERRY LAD. When it grows up, it is once again STRAWBERRY MAN.
This REVEALEON, COMMON has found the perfect camouflage: an unsuspecting stump. Usually found in the middle of a forest, it prefers to roll away rather than run away from danger.
This REVEALEON, COMMON appreciates the art of faberge eggs and baking, and has changed its body shape to reflect its tastes. The cinnamon bun is actually its tail, and should not be eaten.
This REVEALEON, COMMON may be disguised as a bunch of grapes, or it may be disguised as a single grape and is hiding inside a bunch of grapes. Only time will tell.

Physiology REVEALEONS, COMMON vary wildly in size, shape and color, but always have at least one eye (or other visual organ) and a curled tail. SURVEILLEONS, COMMON vary wildly in size, shape and color, but always have at least [REDACTED]. In addition, at least one [REDACTED], one [REDACTED] and one curled tail. See previous apology.

Reproduction REVEALEONS, COMMON reproduce via Holo-Genesis. When a REVEALEON, COMMON has determined it has observed enough of its environment, it will project a (scaled down) holographic image of itself, and begin uploading its observations to that hologram. As the observations are transferred, the hologram changes shape and begins to take physical form. Eventually, the hologram becomes its own REVEALEON, COMMON, with its own appearance and personality, based on the observations that were transferred to it during creation.
End of data. Thank you for using TAL.
